title: Zero to First 10 Customers Sprint
subtitle: Get your first paying customers using systematic, repeatable methods
outcome: A clear plan to acquire your first 10 paying customers with specific tactics, timelines, and accountability
deliverables: Direct introductions to potential early customers (VIP)

agenda.title: Define Your First Customer
agenda.details: Identify who will buy first and why

agenda.title: Pricing & Packaging
agenda.details: Set pricing that converts early adopters

agenda.title: Sales Process & Conversion
agenda.details: Design your sales process from first contact to close

agenda.title: 30-Day Plan & Accountability
agenda.details: Create your execution roadmap with milestones

whoItsFor: Pre-revenue startups with a product ready to sell
Founders who need systematic customer acquisition
Solo founders building their first customer base
whoItsNotFor: Startups with more than 10 paying customers

facilitator.name: David Park
facilitator.title: Serial founder, acquired first 1000 customers for 3 startups
